review: I have Amazin Prime and love this!  It has a huge selection and very clear picture.
author: Dad

review: Its OK but I was trying to not pay a high cable TV bill and with the apps on the fire stick every channel you subscribed to charge $15- 20 ducks a month ESPN, or basic TV with local shows not worth it for people trying to save money the only thing its good for is streaming Netflix @ $8 a month I'm winning.The worse thing is ordering movies new release @ about $6 a pop where Red box a movie @ $1.50 a night or the movie theater may have cheap days in your area.
author: Cree McGhee

review: would like to see more older war movies free .they are cheaper at redbox
author: abby clifford

review: Fire TV StickInstantly turns almost any TV into a Smart TVJust plug it in and it works. Being able to take Amazon Prime with you anywhere is fabulous.
author: Deep Thought

review: I BOUGHT CHROMECAST FIRST. THEN PURCHASED FIRE STICK. FIRESTICK GETS A+. SO MUCH EASIER TO WORK THAN CHROMECAST.
author: Teri

review: Easy to navigate and use. Gives many options for viewing tv and movies.
author: Sharon

review: Connects very easy.  Does what it's supposed to
author: Terry
